Reviews.Title: BEST.PHONE.EVER!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Melissa R.
Reviews.Content: For about 12 years I have been buying new smartphones for me and my daughter.But this year I lost my job so money has been tight and unfortunatly I couldn't afford the new Iphone 5s.My daughter was really bummed about this and so was I but I didn't want to dissapointed so I decided to update our phones anyway. I really tried to get a name brand smartphone like blackberry or the Samsung Galaxy but those phones were just to exspensive. But I still didn't give up the search for a new phone and that's when I came across this awesome smartphone. Even though this was more of a generic phone I have to say it is extremely high quality and when you buy one here is what to expect:fast internet browsing.high app storageCrisp and clear camera photos.lots of phone call talk time.hours and hours of battery life.beautiful graphics.highly cutomizable ringtones.easily enjoy watching videos and moviesYou really should buy this phone it has to be at least 10 times better than a lot the $400 and $500 I have bought but it's only like a1/6 of the price! I would highly recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: The Cell phone delivered that does not match the bid. - El teléfono celular entregado que no coincide con la oferta.
Reviews.Author: matosrafael
Reviews.Content: Greetings all, I write from Venezuela, the phone that I get, not what is on sale, because I get a phone with the following features:1. - Both cameras have a resolution of 2 Megapixels, instead of having a 3-megapixel rear camera as shown in the ad.2. -. - The RAM is 222 MB instead of 512 MB​​.3. - ROM memory is 156 MB, instead of 256 MB.4. - Has Cortex A7, a single processor Core5. - Accessories like protectors are not the same when published.As you will see the phone they gave me is different from what is offered, the company AMAZON should find this case to prevent misleading advertising that affects the credibility of the online store and worldwide.ESPAÑOL.Saludos a todos,  le escribo desde Venezuela, el teléfono que me llego , no corresponde a lo que está en la venta, ya que me llego un teléfono con las siguientes características:1.- Ambas cámaras tiene una resolución de 2 Megapixel , en vez de tener  cámara trasera de 3 Megapixel como indica la publicidad.2.- La memoria RAM es de 222 MB, en vez de 512 MB .3.- La memoria ROM es de 156 MB , en vez de 256 MB.4.- Tiene Cortex A7 , un solo procesador Core5.- Los accesorios como protectores no son los mismos al publicado.Como se verá  el teléfono que me entregaron es diferente a lo ofertado, la empresa AMAZON deberá averiguar este caso, para evitar la publicidad engañosa que afecte la credibilidad de esta tienda en línea y a nivel mundial.

Reviews.Title: about this phone
Reviews.Author: Yohendrick Camacaro
Reviews.Content: so im purchased 2 phone and work nice, is like mini s3 the size is perfect no more big..app work, faster, is not 3g but data run fast...camera 3mp work nice.. for this price the phone is good..the only detail is not skin protector or cover..

Reviews.Title: Sucks do not buy this phone
Reviews.Author: Tuffy
Reviews.Content: Ok for one I got a different phone than the one in the advertisement..i got teh package and one of the batteries were broken..the phone came on once and during that time i tested the camera and the flash didnt work...and it was slow as shi* I had ordered a case according to what was in the pics showing what i would be getting ..now i have a case and screen protector that does not suit this lemon of a phone. I am sooo angry right now you cant even imagine.. Plz folks dont get this piece of crap phone it sucks...now i have to file a claim to get my money bk if the seller doesnt respond and correct this horrible buy.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Jackson
Reviews.Content: The rating should be a negative star. This phone freezes a lot , the text input method changes by itself, and it's super slow. It should be sold for $5. I would rather use a flip phone than this one. PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME BUYING THIS PHONE BECAUSE YOU WILL REGRET IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: What the??
Reviews.Author: K. Young
Reviews.Content: I was so disappointed in this phone. I thought I was getting a lot for the money, but the reason for a smart phone is the use of apps right? I have an app for my bank accounts, car insurance, etc. After trying to download my apps, the phones internal memory was already at max with the pre-loaded apps. Even after transferring them to the Micro SD car,I kept getting the message that the phone was at max, would't for anything. Screen was very blurred, and becuase of the capacity issue the phone would freeze even when trying to unlock the screen as well as any other function. Please do not get this phone!!

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: Jomo Gulston
Reviews.Content: Daughter has this phone and it appears competitive in terms of its functionality. The APPS are pretty smooth and the cpu seems fast.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: apart from the main camera that is offered with 3.0 mp, the phone i received is just 2.0 mp, for the rest, better than expected,looks great and like the expensive ones, i bought this for my ten year old son and he is really happy with his (clone) mini galaxy S4. the only reason why i dont give five stars is the detail with the main cam.

Reviews.Title: Great (S3)
Reviews.Author: Azarias Cardona
Reviews.Content: better than expectedlooks great and no difference with expensive onesI will be waiting the next generation (S4) to change my wife's one

Reviews.Title: ITS NOT THE SAME
Reviews.Author: Raul W. Campos
Reviews.Content: ITS NOT THE SAME PRODUCT THAT OFFER TO YOU.... ITS NORMAL BUT I'M NOT ADVISE TO YOU.. BAD CAMERA SLOW AND BAD RESOLUTION... DONT BUY IT

Reviews.Title: Really isn't what I expected.
Reviews.Author: MeLisha Walker
Reviews.Content: I got the phone and I can't download apps. It doesn't come with google play store installed and I can't seem to download it. The internet only works when I have wifi. Also I tried to change the APN settings so I could use the data instead of wifi but it wouldn't allow me to change all the settings to configure the WLAN to do so. So I have an unlimited straight talk plan with unlimited everything but can't use the unlimited data. So overall this phone isn't what I thought it was going to be.

Reviews.Title: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!
Reviews.Author: Clarissa R Jones
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter for making the honor roll her first marking period. She picked it out it doesn't load well its obsolete in a lot of it's functions, It was an overall disappointment and I also bought the rhino armor case/holster  it doesn't even fit the phone its too long for the phone!! As for the rating of this phone it doesn't even get a half of a star, It's really a disgrace to the Samsung galaxy s 3 only thing they have in common is the color. My daughter is so unhappy with this product, so you know I am as well.

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: Oshane Wright
Reviews.Content: battery life poor....cheaply made! Explains the cost!! Has the looks almost like a galaxy but in truth n in fact in its not

Reviews.Title: complaints
Reviews.Author: Miguel R.
Reviews.Content: good night I have a question about the contents of the box since I made ​​the purchase of this item and it turns out the contents of the box is completely different to the one shown in the photos I was sent a team with android operating system but different model.  the model described in the pictures is the the i9300 and i9502 have received completely different model having problems with Internet Connection and its utility making it difficult so please respond as soon as possible

Reviews.Title: NOKIA CHEAPEST PHONE HAS BETTER QUALITY!!! DO NOT BUY THIS CRAPPY PHONE.
Reviews.Author: Jody Anita Hepburn
Reviews.Content: Cons: phone crashes alot, keyboard to text (doesnt appear at times u would have to restart it just to be able to see ur keypad to text...), camera is horrible (it says its 3mp but doesnt really work), internal memory isnt much and the phone keeps alerting u that its full. Had phoney/ useless apps that u cnt uninstall.. doest allow people to call me anymore. You cant download the apps u want. Flash is bright its useless. Settings is annoying n vague. The app called flashlight downloads chinese spam with pictures that looks like porn... bewarePros: looks expensive, performs better with age, very cheap.If ur looking for quality and reliable service this is not the phone. This phone is not for everyday use and cant function with too much apps in use or rapid response.DO NOT BUY THIS ITS A CON PLASTIC PIECE OF CRAP AND TURNS OFF LIKE A TV. JUST SAVE UP AND BUY THE TOP BRANDS SAMSUNG HTC NOKIA BLACKBERRY OR IPHONE... HOPE THIS HELPED :).. :( i bought two... :'(

Reviews.Title: dosnt works beware troubles
Reviews.Author: Hector A. Gutierrez Gtz
Reviews.Content: terrible phone, dosnt works., lot of troubles whit this phone, poor reception, speaker dosnt works. low battery power, its a waste
